mapper.select: select a.sizety,a.sizeno,b.sizenm from ORD_SIZEDTL a ,ORD_PUB_SIZE b where a.sizety=b.sizety and a.sizeno=b.sizeno and a.fszty='PRDSZFW' and a.fszno=#{sizegp} --and NVL(b.SIZETY1,1)=1 order by a.sizety desc,a.sizeno
mapper.update: update ORD_ORDHD a set ORSTAT=3,SZSTAT=3 where a.mtorno=#{mtorno} and a.bradno=#{bradno}
